enWisdom: Make your demeanour gentle and humble yourself in front of Allah, He will elevate you

Wisdom: أَلِنْ كَنَفَكَ فَإِنَّ مَنْ يُلِنْ كَنَفَهُ يَسْتَدِمْ مِنْ قَوْمِهِ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: Make your demeanour gentle for indeed whoever has a gentle demeanour, his community’s love [for him] will last
Through gentleness, the souls feel at ease
One whose speech is polite, loving him becomes unavoidable

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُحْسِنِ الِاسْتِعْطَافَ قُوبِلَ بِالاسْتِخْفَافِ
enWisdom: One who is not good at seeking sympathy is faced with scorn

Wisdom: مَنْ تَلِنْ حَاشِيَتُهُ يَسْتَدِمْ مِنْ قَوْمِهِ الْمَحَبَّةَ
enWisdom: One who has a gentle demeanour makes his community’s love [for him] last

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يَلِنْ لِمَنْ دُونَهُ لَمْ يَنَلْ حَاجَتَهُ
enWisdom: One who is not lenient with the one who is under him will not obtain what he requires
Never turn your face away disdainfully and be courteous [to others];
Leniency is the infusion of goodness and the symbol of success
The greatest [form of] piety is gentleness
